Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Change using msg.label.

Change using msg.color.

Top/center/bottom. Change using msg.align.

Left/center/right. Change using msg.justify.

100,200..900. Change using msg.weight.

Any font-size CSS value. Change using msg.size.

CSS padding around label. Change using msg.padding.
